nova_section.headline: You Can't Be Everywhere.
nova_section.subheadline: Having a friendly face is great. Having a ruthless sales manager is better. Nova is the brain behind the boys.
nova_section.feature1_desc: Customer complains to Marco? Nova flags it instantly so you can fix it before they post on Google.
nova_section.feature2_desc: Nova remembers every birthday, every allergy, and every favorite dish. Your regulars will feel like royalty without you training staff.
nova_section.feature3_desc: Slow Tuesday? Nova can blast a promo to your top 100 customers instantly. Customer hasn't visited in 30 days? Nova sends a 'We Miss You' voucher.

pain.headline: Every Day You Wait, You Lose Money
pain.subheadline: These problems are costing Malaysian restaurants thousands every month
pain.desc1: 20-40% of calls go unanswered during peak hours. Each missed call = lost booking.

pain.desc3: No automated reminders = customers forget. Empty tables on busy nights.
pain.desc4: Grab and FoodPanda take nearly a third. Your customers, their profit.

cta.headline: Get Your Life Back.
cta.body: Imagine a Friday night where the phone doesn't ring because Marco answered it. Imagine waking up to RM2,000 in bookings that Nova secured while you slept. Imagine a staff member who never asks for leave, never has a bad attitude, and loves your customers 24/7.
